item.title: OnePlus’ 2-in-1 USB cable charges your phone and smartwatch at the same time
item.description: OnePlus announced a new USB-C charging cable that does more than just pass power and data from one device to another. The OnePlus 2-in-1 Supervooc Cable features an inline pogo pin connector that can
